agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Juvenile Justice & Family Issues TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, April 24, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Harold V. Dutton, Jr. HB 560 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to access to a residence or former residence to retrieve personal property by persons who are parties to certain suits and decrees. HB 1807 Dutton | et al. Relating to alternative times of possession under a standard possession order in a suit affecting the parent-child relationship. HB 2157 Middleton | et al. Relating to equal parenting orders in suits affecting the parent-child relationship. HB 3085 Dutton Relating to an award of costs and attorney's fees and the imposition of sanctions in certain suits for the dissolution of a marriage or affecting the parent-child relationship. HB 3414 Sanford Relating to alternative equal access times of possession under a standard possession order in a suit affecting the parent-child relationship. HB 3879 Ramos Relating to the participation of armed forces members in a marriage ceremony through video conference technology. HB 4103 White Relating to the discretionary sealing of certain juvenile records. HB 4267 Wu Relating to requirements for a juvenile's appearance in a judicial proceeding. HB 4607 White Relating to the construction of small occupancy facilities by the Texas Juvenile Justice Department. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
